plan: URGENT: 90% lapse risk detected. Immediate retention protocol. [Doc4]

plan: Proactive retention: 52% lapse risk. Engage before escalation. [Doc4]
Assign dedicated agent for quarterly check-ins and policy optimization reviews. [Doc2]
Monitor engagement: Track response to offers; escalate if no action within 14 days. [Doc1]
